name: TowerSecretEnding
description: The Secret Ending to Floor 1 of The Tower!

explorationMode.name: Secret Ending Exploration Mode
explorationMode.description:
<cp>UNLOCK THE SECRET ENDING FIRST!</c>
<cd>(Pick up the bomb in The Cellar, then pause the game.)</c>

<cl>"As Seen on YT"</c>: Only one level from <cy>The Secret Ending</c> can be active.
<cl>"Previous Doors Also Unlock"</c>: Return to any unlocked levels from <cy>The Secret Ending</c>.
<cl>"Free Roam"</c>: Freely play any level from <cy>The Secret Ending</c>.

issues.info: Ping me <cl>(@erymanthus)</c> in the Geode SDK Discord server's <cl>#help</c> channel if you need help. <cr>DMs are NOT accepted.</c>
